member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuNewClick
member.summary: When the new button is clicked this clears the main text window while saving a copy of the new file which is empty to start

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuOpenClick
member.summary: When the open button is pressed this puts the file chosen into the main text window

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuSaveClick
member.summary: When the save button is pressed the document is written to the file chosen by the Save File Dialogue box if the file has not been saved

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuSaveAsClick
member.summary: Similar to the save button, this button saves the file but asks for a file name every time

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuCopyClick
member.summary: Copies the selected text from the main text window to the clipboard

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuCutClick
member.summary: Cuts the selected text from the main text window and copy it to the clipboard

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuPasteClick
member.summary: Pastes text from the clipboard into the main text window

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.mnuAboutClick
member.summary: Displays a message box with information about the program

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.writeFile(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a file to the specified file name as a parameter

member.name: M:Lab5MattWareNETD2202.frmTextEditor.confirmClose
member.summary: Confirm Close function responsible for bonus parts one and two Compares the current screen text to the original file If the files are not identical then confirm the close operation
